      • ScalableColorImpl

        public ScalableColorImpl(int[] pixels)
        Use this constructor if the pixel data was taken from a non rectangular region. Please note that the neighbourhood of pixels cannot be taken into account (No reliable spatial coherency can be created). The pixels array goes like: {pixel1[0], pixel1[1], pixel1[2], pixel2[0], pixel2[1], ...}
        please note that althought
        Parameters:
        pixels - gives the pixels one int after another.
